Liste des commandes

Pas de commandes
//
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {CommandModel} from "../../model/command"; import {CommandService} from "../command.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-command-list', templateUrl: './command-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./command-list.component.css'] }) export class CommandListComponent implements OnInit{ commands : CommandModel[]; constructor(private commandeService : CommandService) {} ngOnInit(): void { //this.commandeService.findAll().subscribe(v=> this.commandList = v); } }
